attributes.action: Make anyone between 10 and 60 all pay the same fare rate for using a bus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It now cost £2 if you want to use a bus anywhere in london and greater London to go anywhere even if it is down the road. How is that fare and how does it encourge the use of public transport? They say the answer to that is to buy an oyster card, but not everyone needs to use public transport everyday or even every six months. Everyone between this age group should pay a flat rate. All these high prices do is encourage the use of a car which is probably why in non peek times you see about five people to a double decker bus, How is that good for the enviorment or anyone else!
